text: Sun Du (; 1898–1967) was a Kuomintang general from Yunnan. From March 1945 until September 1947, he was the commander of the 1st Army Group of the National Revolutionary Army of the Republic of China. ==See also== *List of Army Groups of the National Revolutionary Army Category:1898 births Category:1967 deaths Category:National Revolutionary Army generals from Yunnan Category:People from Qujing Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Yunnan
title: Sun Du
